description: Try our easy to follow Easy Tomato Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Tomato Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 slice bread sourdough kalamata olive, cut into 3cm cubes
0.33 cup olive oil (use 1/4 cup and save the rest to drizzle)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep saucepan over medium heat. Cook onion for 4 minutes or until tender. Stir in tomato and cook for 10 minutes or until softened. Add stock and 3 cups water. Bring to the boil and cook for 20 minutes or until tomato is very soft and mixture has thickened.
Add risoni and cook for 8 minutes or until almost cooked. Stir in zucchini and cook for 2 minutes or until softened.
Meanwhile, preheat oven to 180Â°C. Place bread on a baking tray and drizzle with oil. Bake for 4 minutes. Top with cheese. Bake for 2-3 minutes until melted.
Fry salami in a pan over medium heat for 8 minutes until crisp. Serve soup topped with cheesy croutons, salami and parsley.
